item.title: Revealed: The surprising stat that allowed NZ schools to open
item.description:
Closing schools and childcare centres probably had only a minimal effect on reducing Covid-19, but is causing major social damage, the Ministry of Health says.
The ministry has released a 16-page document ...

item.title: Experts: How New Zealand could pull off bold goal of eliminating virus
item.description:
While most countries are working on ways to contain the coronavirus, New Zealand has set itself a much more ambitious goal: eliminating it altogether.
And experts believe the country could pull it off ...

item.title: 'Most of it was manufactured': Convicted killer David Tamihere speaks out
item.description:
